verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We are troubled on every side - but not distressed
Bewildered and confused - but not in despair
Persecuted and pursued - we don't stand alone
We are struck down to the ground - but not overcome!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We have an anchor, sure and steadfast
Secure in the Presence of our God
It will not give way in the tempest
We hold fast to this hope; it is our anchor.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Why so downcast, o my soul? - Hope in God!
Be of good courage - He will stengthen your heart
Do not listen to the fears - let faith arise
Hold on to your confidence - firm 'til the end
